fr.uga.pddl4j.util

Class BitOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.uga.pddl4j.util.AbstractCodedOp
      • fr.uga.pddl4j.util.BitOp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CodedOp, java.io.Serializable

    public class BitOp
extends AbstractCodedOp
    This class implements a compact representation for action based on BitSet structure.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
